links.title: Jump on the Application in Turbonomic ARM UI

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  TO_CHAR(recommendation_time, 'dd/mm/yyyy hh:mm:ss') AS "Recommendation Time",
  e.name as "Component Name",
  --e.type as "type",
  CASE pa.category
    WHEN 'PERFORMANCE_ASSURANCE' THEN 'Performance Assurance'
    WHEN 'PREVENTION' THEN 'Prevention'
    WHEN 'EFFICIENCY_IMPROVEMENT' THEN 'Efficiency Improvement'
    WHEN 'COMPLIANCE' THEN 'Compliance' END as "Category",
  pa."type" as "Type",
  pa.description AS "Description"
FROM pending_action pa
JOIN entity e ON e.oid = pa.target_entity_id
WHERE
  pa.target_entity_id IN
  (
    SELECT
      DISTINCT s.scoped_oid
    FROM scope s
    --JOIN entity e ON s.scoped_oid = e.oid
    WHERE
      s.seed_oid IN (${APPLICATION_OID})
    --AND e.type <> 'GROUP'
    AND s.finish > now()
  )
ORDER BY 1 DESC

SELECT
  TO_CHAR(recommendation_time, 'dd/mm/yyyy hh:mm:ss') AS "Recommendation Time",
  e.name as "Component Name",
  --e.type as "type",
  CASE pa.category
    WHEN 'PERFORMANCE_ASSURANCE' THEN 'Performance Assurance'
    WHEN 'PREVENTION' THEN 'Prevention'
    WHEN 'EFFICIENCY_IMPROVEMENT' THEN 'Efficiency Improvement'
    WHEN 'COMPLIANCE' THEN 'Compliance' END as "Category",
  pa."type" as "Type",
  pa.description AS "Description"
FROM pending_action pa
JOIN entity e ON e.oid = pa.target_entity_id
WHERE
  pa.target_entity_id IN
  (
    select s.scoped_oid
    from "scope" s 
    where s.seed_oid in (
      select s.scoped_oid
	    from "scope" s 
	    where s.scoped_type = 'PHYSICAL_MACHINE'
	    and s.seed_oid IN (${APPLICATION_OID})
	    and s.finish > now()
	  )
  and s.scoped_type = 'VIRTUAL_MACHINE'
  and s.finish > now()
  )
AND pa.type IN ('MOVE', 'PROVISION', 'SUSPEND')
AND ('${INCLUDE_NEIGHBORS}' = 'Yes')
ORDER BY 1 DESC

SELECT
  TO_CHAR(recommendation_time, 'dd/mm/yyyy hh:mm:ss') AS "Recommendation Time",
  e.name as "Component Name",
  --e.type as "type",
  CASE ca.category
    WHEN 'PERFORMANCE_ASSURANCE' THEN 'Performance Assurance'
    WHEN 'PREVENTION' THEN 'Prevention'
    WHEN 'EFFICIENCY_IMPROVEMENT' THEN 'Efficiency Improvement'
    WHEN 'COMPLIANCE' THEN 'Compliance' END as "Category",
  ca."type" as "Type",
  ca.description AS "Description",
  ca.final_state AS "Final State"
FROM completed_action ca
JOIN entity e ON e.oid = ca.target_entity_id
WHERE
  ca.target_entity_id IN
  (
    SELECT
      DISTINCT s.scoped_oid
    FROM scope s
    --JOIN entity e ON s.scoped_oid = e.oid
    WHERE
      s.seed_oid IN (${APPLICATION_OID})
    --AND e.type <> 'GROUP'
    AND s.finish > now()
  )
ORDER BY 1 DESC

SELECT
  TO_CHAR(recommendation_time, 'dd/mm/yyyy hh:mm:ss') AS "Recommendation Time",
  e.name as "Component Name",
  --e.type as "type",
  CASE ca.category
    WHEN 'PERFORMANCE_ASSURANCE' THEN 'Performance Assurance'
    WHEN 'PREVENTION' THEN 'Prevention'
    WHEN 'EFFICIENCY_IMPROVEMENT' THEN 'Efficiency Improvement'
    WHEN 'COMPLIANCE' THEN 'Compliance' END as "Category",
  ca."type" as "Type",
  ca.description AS "Description",
  ca.final_state AS "Final State"
FROM completed_action ca
JOIN entity e ON e.oid = ca.target_entity_id
WHERE
  ca.target_entity_id IN
  (
    select s.scoped_oid
    from "scope" s 
    where s.seed_oid in (
      select s.scoped_oid
	    from "scope" s 
	    where s.scoped_type = 'PHYSICAL_MACHINE'
	    and s.seed_oid IN (${APPLICATION_OID})
	    and s.finish > now()
	  )
  and s.scoped_type = 'VIRTUAL_MACHINE'
  and s.finish > now()
  )
AND ca.type IN ('MOVE', 'PROVISION', 'SUSPEND')
AND ('${INCLUDE_NEIGHBORS}' = 'Yes')
ORDER BY 1 DESC

SELECT
  time AS "time",
  CASE "type"::text
    WHEN 'RESPONSE_TIME' THEN 'Response Time'
    WHEN 'TRANSACTION' THEN 'Transaction(s)' END as "metric",
  current as "value"
FROM metric m
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time)
  AND entity_oid in ('${APPLICATION_OID}')
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  DISTINCT e.name as "Component Name"
  --e."type" as "Component Type",
  --TO_CHAR(s.start, 'dd/mm/yyyy hh:mm:ss') as "Start Time",
  --TO_CHAR(s.finish, 'dd/mm/yyyy hh:mm:ss') as "Finish Time"
FROM scope s
JOIN entity e ON s.scoped_oid = e.oid
WHERE
  (s.start, s.finish) overlaps ($__timeFrom(), $__timeTo())
  AND s.seed_oid IN (${APPLICATION_OID})
  AND e.type <> 'GROUP'
  AND e.type = 'BUSINESS_TRANSACTION'
ORDER BY 1 ASC

SELECT
  DISTINCT e.name as "Component Name"
  --e."type" as "Component Type",
  --TO_CHAR(s.start, 'dd/mm/yyyy hh:mm:ss') as "Start Time",
  --TO_CHAR(s.finish, 'dd/mm/yyyy hh:mm:ss') as "Finish Time"
FROM scope s
JOIN entity e ON s.scoped_oid = e.oid
WHERE
  (s.start, s.finish) overlaps ($__timeFrom(), $__timeTo())
  AND s.seed_oid IN (${APPLICATION_OID})
  AND e.type <> 'GROUP'
  AND e.type = 'SERVICE'
ORDER BY 1 ASC

SELECT
  DISTINCT e.name as "Component Name"
  --e."type" as "Component Type",
  --TO_CHAR(s.start, 'dd/mm/yyyy hh:mm:ss') as "Start Time",
  --TO_CHAR(s.finish, 'dd/mm/yyyy hh:mm:ss') as "Finish Time"
FROM scope s
JOIN entity e ON s.scoped_oid = e.oid
WHERE
  (s.start, s.finish) overlaps ($__timeFrom(), $__timeTo())
  AND s.seed_oid IN (${APPLICATION_OID})
  AND e.type <> 'GROUP'
  AND e.type = 'APPLICATION_COMPONENT'
ORDER BY 1 ASC

SELECT
  DISTINCT e.name as "Component Name",
  e."type" as "Component Type",
  TO_CHAR(s.start, 'dd/mm/yyyy hh:mm:ss') as "Start Time",
  TO_CHAR(s.finish, 'dd/mm/yyyy hh:mm:ss') as "Finish Time"
FROM scope s
JOIN entity e ON s.scoped_oid = e.oid
WHERE
  (s.start, s.finish) overlaps ($__timeFrom(), $__timeTo())
  AND s.seed_oid IN (${APPLICATION_OID})
  AND e.type <> 'GROUP'
ORDER BY 2 ASC

list.definition: select e.name from entity e where e."type" = 'BUSINESS_APPLICATION' order by e.name
list.label: Application
list.name: APPLICATION_NAME
list.query: select e.name from entity e where e."type" = 'BUSINESS_APPLICATION' order by e.name

list.definition: select e.oid from entity e where e."type" = 'BUSINESS_APPLICATION' and e.name IN ('${APPLICATION_NAME}')
list.label: Application OID
list.name: APPLICATION_OID
list.query: select e.oid from entity e where e."type" = 'BUSINESS_APPLICATION' and e.name IN ('${APPLICATION_NAME}')
